title: Where Am I?
description:
View your current location and its details on your Android phone using app. This is very useful when you are in a new location or traveling.
User can get many other useful details :
1. Address
2. Lat & Long
Added features :
- You can share the location with latitude and longitude
- You can copy the location with latitude and longitude
User can customize his/her location by selecting the location on Map OR entering the address.
Also can calculate the distance between current location and target location Or any two locations.
